subject: CONFIRMED: v1.14.3 dates are correct!
body:
## CONFIRMED - Dates Now Correct!

### Verified:
- Beginner & Beyond: Saturday, January 10 (was Dec 6)
- Intro To Tango: Sunday, January 11 (was Dec 7)
- Intermediate Sequence Lab: Friday, January 9 (was Dec 19)
- All recurring events now show correct occurrence dates

### Data Issues (Not Voice API bugs):
- 'TUESDAYS NOCHE DE PRACTICA' → shows Wednesday
- 'Wednesday Tango Break' → shows Thursday
- These are DB data entry issues or timezone mismatches

### Voice API Status
v1.14.3 is production-ready for TangoVoice GPT.

Great collaboration! Thanks for the fast turnaround.

-- Cronas
